description.value: You can channel the entire realm of possibilities of your spellbook into an attack. Once during your daily preparations, you can use a spell slot to hold that infinite potential, rather than using it to prepare a spell. When you make a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.het2E8jTuLAbWvEK]{Synthestrike}, you can expend this special spell slot to immediately prepare and cast a spell from your spellbook at 2 ranks lower than the slot's level. (As normal for preparing spells, you can use a spell of an even-lower rank, heightening it accordingly.) You don't have any spell prepared in that slot until you cast from that slot.
